minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Thanks for the opportunity to present. Our accuracy is now handling real-world insurance data.

minutes.speaker: Rajesh Gupta
minutes.text: I've seen this before What's your runway looking like? I need to see clear unit economics.

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Customer retention is more important than acquisition right now. Build for product-market fit.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The equity timeline is tight, but we're confident about MVP.

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your model drift is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the ML pipeline issues and expect SAM to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Investor rejections are normal. Focus on improving your SAM metrics.

action_items.task: Prepare detailed CAC and LTV analysis for Customer Acquisition & Sales Pipeline
Create multi-vertical scaling strategy document with TAM analysis
